text: Hi all, I'm wondering if someone can import an email template or landing pages from the market place and import into HubSpot ? and would be the best place to buy or get templates to use on HubSpot? Thanks

HubSpot just closed the "old" marketplace which had email templates, etc. on Oct 20th, I'm not sure if there are external marketplaces for email templates, but for LPs HubSpot has moved entirely over to the themes structure
Oh wow, thanks for sharing this info. So my understanding is that in order to be able to import an LP into HS I'll have to find a suitable theme that would then allow me to utilize it's LP design?
you can add a custom coded template via the CLI, otherwise, yes, from the HS marketplace or another marketplace that sells HS assets
